summary: This document is a chronological log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York covering July 23-24, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It notes Epstein was transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019, and that an I/M companion was utilized during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the inmate referenced in the prison log, being transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019.

events.title: I/M Companion Assumes Duties
events.description: An I/M (Inmate) companion assumed duties from staff at 7 am.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation at 8:45 am.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Ends
events.description: Epstein's period in psych observation ended at 8:15 am.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation at MCC New York on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am.
An I/M (Inmate) companion was utilized for Epstein from July 23, 2019, at 7 am until July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am, and again from July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 am.
The document is a chronological log from the Associate Warden of MCC New York, dated August 12, 2019.
